title: Thunderbird receives incoming mail, won't send outgoing mail
content:
Running Thunderbird 115 on a Mac laptop running Sonoma 14.4.1 Server name: mail.rainierconnect.com Port 587 Connection Security: STARTTLS Authentification: Normal password

Beginning at 3:30 pm (PST) this afternoon the laptop would show this error message after user pressed send:

"Must issue a STARTTLS command first"

Laptop receives mail fine. User can send and receive mail on her iPhone.

ISP verified that the Server Names and settings for incoming and outgoing mail are correct.
creator: henrysuso

title: Mozilla Thunderbird
content: My Thunderbird email is not responding and also give me a message which says my email peter566@exemail.com.au is not correct when I know it is so how can I get into my settings to try and fix the problem.
creator: peter5661
